About Me

Hello, I am a lifelong learner. What is that ? well I am a very curious person who enjoys figuring out how things work and when faced with a challenge or a ‘bug’ in a line of code I see it as a learning opportunity. Now I don't know everything there is about web development but that's ok, challenge accepted .

Front End Quiz Game

Studying can get boring sometimes so I decided to make it fun with this quiz game. The questions focus on HTML JavaScript and CSS. The game keeps score but if you get one wrong answer you lose a point.

Olympic Weightlifting

Material Design is a design language that Google developed. I am a big fan of google's materialize design and decided to step away from bootstrap and work with Materialize css for this project.

Budget App

Free code camp has been a big part of my journey to becoming a developer and this is an awesome project they have on their site. I love material design so that was a big influence on the UI
